The DeclareDesign project is directed by [Graeme Blair](https://graemeblair.com) (UCLA), [Jasper Cooper](http://jasper-cooper.com) (Columbia University), [Alexander Coppock](http://alexandercoppock.com) (Yale University), and [Macartan Humphreys](http://macartan.nyc) (Columbia University and WZB).

## Project contributors

DeclareDesign has benefited from the contributions of many researchers and coders. We recognize contributors in addition to the principal investigators to each component:

`DeclareDesign` for R: Neal Fultz

`estimatr` for R: [Luke Sonnet](http://lukesonnet.com)

`fabricatr` for R: [Aaron Rudkin](http://rudkin.ca)

`randomizr` for Stata: John Ternovski

`DeclareDesignShiny`: Clara Bicalho, Neal Fultz

`DesignLibrary`: Clara Bicalho, Lily Medina, Tara Slough

`declaredesign.org`: Nicholas Rivera

We thank contributors to earlier iterations of the project Thomas Leavitt, Tara Slough, Georgiy Syunyaev, and Anna Wilke. We also thank early beta testers Lauren Young, Erin York, and Yang-Yang Zhou.

# Contributing

We encourage you to contribute to our [design library](/library/),
as well as to submit bug reports and feature requests for our software as [Github](https://github.com/DeclareDesign) issues.
We ask that contributors agree to our [code of conduct](/conduct/).

# Funding

We are grateful for major funding from the [Laura and John Arnold Foundation](http://www.arnoldfoundation.org/)
and seed funding from [EGAP -- Evidence in Governance and Politics](http://egap.org).
